title: Simple Plan - No Pads, No Helmets...Just Balls (2002) [FLAC]
description:
No Pads, No Helmets...Just Balls is the debut studio album by Canadian rock band Simple Plan. It was released on March 19, 2002 on Atlantic Records. The band released four singles from the album. The album features two collaborations, with Joel Madden of Good Charlotte and Mark Hoppus of Blink-182. From June to August 2003, the group went on the edition of Warped Tour for 2003.


Track List


1. 	"I'd Do Anything" (featuring Mark Hoppus) 	3:17
2. 	"The Worst Day Ever" 	3:27
3. 	"You Don't Mean Anything" (featuring Joel Madden) 	2:28
4. 	"I'm Just a Kid" 	3:18
5. 	"When I'm with You" 	2:37
6. 	"Meet You There" 	4:14
7. 	"Addicted" 	3:52
8. 	"My Alien" 	3:08
9. 	"God Must Hate Me" 	2:44
10. 	"I Won't Be There" 	3:09
11. 	"One Day" 	3:15
12. 	"Perfect" 	4:37
